title: Savage Africa
description: Savage Africa. Being the narrative of a tour in equatorial, southwestern and northwestern Africa. (1864). This book, "Savage Africa," by William Winwood Reade, is a replication of a book originally published before 1864. It has been restored by human beings, page by page, so that you may enjoy it in a form as close to the original as possible.
author: William Winwood Reade
